data.title: Sounds Like San Diego: Sept. 20
data.meta_description: The Kopecky Family Band return to San Diego and their loyal fans.
data.text:
There are some artists I have grown attached to. From the very first Kopecky Family Band show in San Diego, the warmth the band exudes through its music and in its offstage demeanor with other bands makes them hard not to love. The Kopecky Family Band is a nonstop touring machine, too, so they've been here enough to earn their heavy following. They're at the Casbah on Saturday, and while I think it's not to be missed, the truth is there are awesome shows all over town , inluding Epic Future Radness' Night 2 at the Til-Two, Jungle at the Belly Up, and the Carlsbad Music Festival, which are all worthy of your attention .

Saturday, Sept. 20:

Kopecky Family Band, Avid Dancer, Spero @ Casbah

Casbah presents: Jungle, Beaty Heart, DJ Rashi @ Belly Up

Epic Future Radness Night 2: the Blank Tapes, Amerikan Bear, the Kabbs, Pearl Charles & the Pipes Canyon Band, Ward Combs @ Til Two Club

Carlsbad Music Festival, featuring Freako Suave, G Burns Jug Band, Giacomo Fiore, the Gift Machine, Jennifer Bewerse, Justin Helland, Kuhn/Motl/Hubbard Trio, Kyle Motl, Murray Hidary, Now Hear Ensemble, Ogd_S(11) Translation Has Failed, Opus Orange, Paper Days, PGK Dance, the Red Fox Tails, Scott Nielsen, Scott Paulson, Sir Henry, Swarmius, Trouble in the Wind, Zaub Nasty, Zimbeat @ Carlsbad Village (free, 3-10:30 p.m.)

Carlsbad Music Festival: Donald Crockett conducts USC Thornton Edge @ Carlsbad Village Theatre (4-5 p.m.)

Carlsbad Music Festival: Sacra/Profana @ Boys and Girls Club (6:30-7:30 p.m.)

Carlsbad Music Festival: Dawn of Midi @ Carlsbad Village Theatre (9-10 p.m.)

Belly Up at the Ballpark, featuring OAR @ Petco Park, after the Padres game

Benefit for Chuey, featuring the Prayers, Emerald Rats, Mirage @ The Hideout

Sole and DJ Pain 1, Ceschi, Hellnote, ID the Poet @ Soda Bar

Neon Beat: Best and Worst of the '80s @ Bar Pink

Casbah presents BANG! Fest: X, Los Lobos, Dave Alvin & Phil Alvin, the Buzzcocks, the Paladins, the Knitters, Wanda Jackson, Junior Brown @ The Observatory (OC)

Agua Dulce @ Croce's Park West

The New Kenetics, the Cardielles, Pleasure Fix @ Tin Can

Mikan Zlatkovich @ Dizzy's

Travel Agents, the Routine, Loyal Heart @ Winston's

DJ Shift @ Fluxx

Citizen @ House of Blues

Caliber @ Humphrey's Backstage Live

Herman's Hermits, the Grass Roots @ Humphrey's Concerts By the Bay

Allison Lonsdale, Eben Brooks, the One and Onlys, Daddy Issues @ Lestat's

Tab Benoit, Chase Walker Band, One Foot in the Blues @ Ramona Mainstage

Turnt Up Island Bash, with Samoan Irok, Josh Wa Wa White, Rasta Joon, Pali Roots @ 710 Beach Club

Allvsion, Jvdas, Krondosis B2B Ledn, Uherd B2B V3k, Brokeboi Reggie, ISCVIO @ SOMA

Doncat, RA RosenBorg @ Sycamore Den

Midnight Eagle, Poontang Clam, the Areas @ Tower Bar

Detroit Underground @ Tio Leo's
